description.@en: When on the road, these leaves will cessate hunger’s pang and help you maintain a steady pace. We harvest them for this very reason, and they are a staple of our diet..

effect.@en:
Effect: You immediately move up the Peril Condition Track from Imperiled to Unhindered. In addition, you can ignore the effects of Starvation for six hours.

Other Considerations: This Drug cannot be applied to a weapon. You can only gain the benefits of chewing Cocoa once every twenty-four hours.
